Item ID11820

The godsword shard 2 is a drop from the bosses and sub-bosses in the God Wars Dungeon. It is used to make a Godsword by using it on an anvil with Godsword shard 1 and 3, creating the Godsword blade. Doing this gives 100 Smithing experience and requires level 80 Smithing.

To then make the Godsword blade usable, a hilt must be attached. Hilts can be removed after being attached. Attaching and removing hilts does not have a Smithing level requirement. Changing a hilt only changes the Special attack of the Godsword - its bonuses remain the same, regardless of hilt.

[[File:Godsword shard 2 detail.png|left|120px]]
The '''godsword shard 2''' is a drop from the bosses and sub-bosses in the [[God Wars Dungeon]]. It is used to make a [[Godsword]] by using it on an anvil with [[Godsword shard 1]] and [[Godsword shard 3|3]], creating the [[Godsword blade]]. Doing this gives 100 [[Smithing]] [[experience]] and requires level 80 Smithing.

To then make the Godsword blade usable, a [[Godsword Hilt|hilt]] must be attached. Hilts can be removed after being attached. Attaching and removing hilts does not have a Smithing level requirement. Changing a hilt only changes the Special attack of the Godsword - its bonuses remain the same, regardless of hilt.
